General.Name: YOUZU Interactive Co Ltd
General.Description: YOOZOO Interactive Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, and distribution of mobile and web games. It provides Game of Thrones Winter Is Coming; Saint Seiya Awakening: Knights of the Zodiac; Era of Celestials; League of Angels-Heaven's Fury; League of Angels, League of Angels II, and League of Angels III; Legacy of Discord; Light of Thel: Glory of Cepheus; Rangers of Oblivion; and Paradise Land games. The company was formerly known as YOOZOO Games Co., Ltd. and changed its name to YOOZOO Interactive Co., Ltd. in April 2021. YOOZOO Interactive Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.
